K

KeepAliveThread - Class in BitTorrent
Keep Alive thread that sends keep alive messages to peer if we are taking long to response so they don't close their connection
KeepAliveThread() - Constructor for class BitTorrent.KeepAliveThread
 
KEY_ANNOUNCE - Static variable in class BitTorrent.TorrentInfo
ByteBuffer to retrieve the announce URL from the metainfo dictionary.
KEY_INFO - Static variable in class BitTorrent.TorrentInfo
Key used to retrieve the info dictionary from the torrent metainfo file.
KEY_INTERVAL - Static variable in class BitTorrent.ConnectToTracker
used to retrieve the interval for tracker scrapes
KEY_LENGTH - Static variable in class BitTorrent.TorrentInfo
Key used to retrieve the length of the torrent.
KEY_MIN_INTERVAL - Static variable in class BitTorrent.ConnectToTracker
used to retrieve the mind interval for tracker scrapes
KEY_NAME - Static variable in class BitTorrent.TorrentInfo
Key used to retrieve the file name.
KEY_PEER_ID - Static variable in class BitTorrent.ConnectToTracker
Key used to retrieve peer ID
KEY_PEER_IP - Static variable in class BitTorrent.ConnectToTracker
Key used to retrieve peer IP
KEY_PEER_PORT - Static variable in class BitTorrent.ConnectToTracker
Key used to retrieve peer port number
KEY_PEERS - Static variable in class BitTorrent.ConnectToTracker
Key used to retrieve peer list
KEY_PIECE_LENGTH - Static variable in class BitTorrent.TorrentInfo
Key used to retrieve the default piece length.
KEY_PIECES - Static variable in class BitTorrent.TorrentInfo
Key used to retrieve the piece hashes.
